DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine the safety and efficacy of bepotastine besilate nasal product in seasonal allergic rhinitis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Bepotastine Besilate Nasal Product in Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis Patients
DOC.criteria: Subjects 18 to 65 years of age with a positive skin prick test to allergen No active respiratory tract infection
